definitions.body: dignity Ge 49:3 (dignity of first-born), Ps 62:5, of Chaldeans Hb Hab 1:7; of God, his exaltation, loftiness Job 13:11, Job 31:23.
swelling, eruption, [[בְּעוֹר בֶּשָׂר]] Le 13:2 ( + [[סַפַּחַת]], [[בַּהֶרֶת]] ), cf. Le 14:56 (+ id.); also Le 13:10, Le 13:10, Le 13:19, Le 13:28, [[הַנֶּגַע]] v:Le 13:43 (all P).
uprising, Job 41:17 at his uprising the mighty are in dread.
Ge 4:7 is dub.;—is there not acceptance ? SyrVer Vulgate al.; forgiveness Targum Holz al.; uplifting of countenance, cheerfulness, Ew De Ke Di Kau.
